import React, { useState, useCallback, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import { Layout, Main } from '../../components/layout/Index' import DataTable from '../../components/table/Index' import Requests from '../../utils/Requests/Index' const Show = () => { const { id } = useParams() const [data, setData] = useState({}) const [isLoading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [header] = useState({ headers: { Authorization: "Bearer " + localStorage.getItem('token') } }) // Get order history const fetchData = useCallback(async () => { try { const response = await Requests.Order.Show(id, header) if (response.status === 200) setData(response.data.data) setLoading(false) } catch (error) { if (error) { setLoading(false) console.log(error.response) } } }, [id, header]) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, [id, header, fetchData]) // handle order status const handleOrderStatus = async event => { try { const value = event.target.value const response = await Requests.Order.ChangeOrderStatus(id, value, header) console.log(value) } catch (error) { if(error) console.log(error) } } // handle payment status const handlePaymentStatus = async event => { try { const value = event.target.value const response = await Requests.Order.ChangePaymentStatus(id, value, header) console.log(value) } catch (error) { if(error) console.log(error) } } const columns = [ { name: '', grow: 0, cell: row => , }, { name: 'Product', cell: row =>

{row.name}

SKU: {row.sku}

}, { name: 'Purchase Price', selector: row => row.purchasePrice + " tk." }, { name: 'Sale Price', selector: row => row.salePrice + " tk." }, { name: 'Quantity', selector: row => row.quantity }, { name: 'Subtotal', selector: row => row.subTotal + " tk." } ] if (isLoading) return

Loading...

return (
{/* Order details */}

Order Code

: {data.orderCode || "N/A"}

Pay with

: {data.paymentMethod || "N/A"}

Payment Status

: {data.paymentStatus || "N/A"}

Order Status

: {data.status || "N/A"}

Delivery Address

: {data.deliveryAddress || "N/A"}

Subtotal

: {data.subTotalPrice || 0} tk.

Delivery Charge

: {data.deliveryCharge || 0} tk.

Total

: {data.totalPrice || 0} tk.

Customer

: {data.customer && data.customer.name ? data.customer.name : "N/A"}

Phone

: {data.customer && data.customer.phone ? data.customer.phone : "N/A"}
{/* Order Status */}

Order Status

{/* Payment Status */}

Payment Status
{/* Order products */}

Products

); }; export default Show;
